data.name: Circles EP: South of the Circle Edition
data.detailed_description:
UPCOMING GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1811040/South_of_the_Circle
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1601570/The_Alters
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1601580/Frostpunk_2


About the Game

Step inside the circle of extraordinary music interpretations


What happens when two composers meet and unleash their creativity? A sound feast of music! Dive into an extraordinary collaboration of Piotr Musiał - the creator of Frostpunk Soundtrack - and Ed Critchley, who has made the ethereal music to South of the Circle game. The Circles EP album contains two covers of each composer's music re-arranged by the other, thus blending the feel of the original mood with the new sensibility.

This package includes:

  • 2 tracks from Frostpunk OST in versions by Ed Critchley
  • 2 tracks from South of the Circle OST in versions by Piotr Musiał
  • 3 exclusive digital postcards (postcards differ between versions. Check Frostpunk version)
All of them in popular formats: wav, flac and mp3.
Upon downloading the files will be placed in the following folder:
...Steam/steamapps/music/Circles EP South of the Circle Edition



Piotr Musiał is a renowned Polish music game composer, who in the past worked on such titles as This War of Mine, The Witcher 3: Blood and Wine, Bulletstorm, Frostpunk and more.

Ed Critchley is a UK-based composer for Bafta award-winning State of Play Games, and remixes for bands such as Archive & Floex.

data.short_description: What happens when two composers meet and unleash their creativity? A sound feast of music! Dive into the Circles EP - a collaboration of Piotr Musiał, the creator of Frostpunk OST, and Ed Critchley, who has made the music to South of the Circle game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 33 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 303 MB available space
